{{Character|character name = Chappy|image = [[Image:Chappy Infobox.png|300px]]|name = Chappy|gender = Male|occ = Pet|relatives = [[Mike Hannigan]] (owner)|first = |number = 1|ep = [[The One With Phoebe's Wedding]]}}'''Chappy''' is a white [[Wikipedia:Bolognese (dog)|Bolognese]] owned by [[Mike Hannigan]]. He was a groomsman during Mike's wedding to [[Phoebe Buffay|Phoebe]], but had to be held by [[Ross Geller|Ross]] during the ceremony due to the fact that he could not stand in the snow. 

Chappy has only appeared in one episode of ''Friends'', [[The One With Phoebe's Wedding]].
